00329 inline Pixel Shape::barycenter () const
00330 {
00331     Pixel barycenter(0,0);
00332     
00333     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < pixels_.size(); ++i )
00334     {
00335         barycenter.first    += pixels_.at(i).first;
00336         barycenter.second   += pixels_.at(i).second;
00337     }
00338     barycenter.first    = barycenter.first  / size_;
00339     barycenter.second   = barycenter.second / size_;
00340     
00341     return barycenter;
00342 };
00343 
00344 
00345 inline Shape Shape::operator+ (const Shape& shape) const
00346 {
00347     Shape temp;
00348     
00349     // Copy the pixels of this shape
00350     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < this->size(); ++i )
00351         temp.addPixel( (*this)(i) );
00352     
00353     // Copy the pixels of the second shape
00354     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < shape.size(); ++i )
00355         temp.addPixel( shape(i) );
00356     
00357     return temp;
00358 };
00359 
00360 
00361 inline bool Shape::operator< (const Shape& shape)
00362 {
00363     bool shapeAbove = (this->bottomPixel().first < shape.topPixel().first) and (this->topPixel().first < shape.topPixel().first);
00364     
00365     if ( shapeAbove )
00366         return true;
00367     else
00368     {
00369         bool shapeBelow = (this->bottomPixel().first > shape.bottomPixel().first) and (this->topPixel().first > shape.bottomPixel().first);
00370         
00371         if ( shapeBelow )
00372             return false;
00373         else
00374         {
00375             // Shapes in the same line
00376             bool shapeOnTheLeft     = (this->leftPixel().second < shape.leftPixel().second) and (this->rightPixel().second <= shape.leftPixel().second);
00377             bool shapeOnTheRight    = (this->leftPixel().second >= shape.rightPixel().second) and (this->rightPixel().second > shape.rightPixel().second);
00378             
00379             if ( shapeOnTheLeft )
00380                 return true;
00381             else
00382             {
00383                 if ( shapeOnTheRight )
00384                     return false;
00385                 else
00386                     return true;
00387             }
00388         }
00389     }
00390 };

00393 inline Pixel Shape::topLeftCorner () const
00394 {
00395     return Pixel(topPixel_.first, leftPixel_.second);
00396 };
